name: Concept Sync
description:
This game is based off of a game the Swedish Military apparently used to use for recruiting: https://kotaku.com/the-swedish-militarys-recruiting-game-is-really-fun-158732800...

Controls: (weird I know, but they're meant for a specific Arcade Cabinet setup)

Player 1: A and D

Player 2: <- and ->

Player 3: G and V

Player 4: L and ,
